text: Apple Inc. was founded by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne in April 1976.
Microsoft was established in Albuquerque, New Mexico by Bill Gates and Paul Allen.
Amazon has its headquarters in Seattle, Washington. Jeff Bezos founded the company in 1994.
Google was founded by Larry Page and Sergey Brin while they were Ph.D. students at Stanford University in California.
Tesla, led by Elon Musk, is headquartered in Austin, Texas.
